articles.title: Living with Type 2 diabetes? How weight loss can help improve your heart health
articles.description: Type 2 diabetes, especially when accompanied by obesity or excess weight, can cause acute and chronic complications such as hypoglycemia, hyperglycemia, high blood pressure, high cholesterol and atherosclerosis.
